name: V&C Solutions
tag_list: it-support, it-services, computer-consulting, computer-support, network-consulting, small-businesses-it-support, information-security
overview:
V&C Solutions is an information technology consulting companywith broad experience in all aspects on IT: Security/Network/Server/Desktop. Interested in working with Small and Medium Sized Businesses. Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP)

V&C Solutions is the San Francisco Bay Area’s leading computer support company. We are specializing on general Desktop/Server/Network infrastructure, Information Security, Exchange and Blackberry servers.

V&C Solutions was founded on the promise of unparalleled customer service and proactive maintenance. Our mission is to provide dependable, affordable, and effective IT solutions that will help grow your business - not slow it down.

We offer smart and flexible options to help grow your company and maintain your existing IT infrastructure. Our friendly, helpful, and experienced support team has over 30 years of experience in the IT industry. We take great pride in our work and in our client’s satisfaction.

Specialties Windows 2003 server, Windows 2008 Server, Active Directory, DHCP, DNS, Windows 2003/2008 Small Business Server,Cisco switches/Firewalls/Routers, SonicWall Firewalls/SSL VPN, VMware ESX Server, Tivoli, Symantec Backup Exec, Trend Mirco, ISS, ESET, Juniper Firewalls.
